sourcesContent:
import {HiHome} from 'react-icons/hi'
import {AiFillFire} from 'react-icons/ai'
import {SiYoutubegaming} from 'react-icons/si'
import {MdPlaylistAdd} from 'react-icons/md'

import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'
import {Component} from 'react'
import ThemeContext from '../../context/ThemeContext'
import {
  DivContainer,
  LabelElement,
  SelectElement,
  SelectItem,
  LargeScreenIconsContainer,
  ProfileImage,
  LogoutButton,
} from './styledComponents'

import './index.css'

class Navbar extends Component {
  render() {
    return (
      <ThemeContext.Consumer>
        {value => {
          const {lightTheme} = value
          const color = lightTheme ? '#000000' : '#ffffff'
          const hoverBgColor = lightTheme ? '#616e7c' : '#475569'

          return (
            <DivContainer>
              <LabelElement lightTheme={lightTheme}>
                <Link to="/" className="linkItem" onClick={this.onSelect}>
                  <SelectElement lightTheme={lightTheme}>
                    <AiFillHome />
                    <SelectItem lightTheme={lightTheme}>Home</SelectItem>
                  </SelectElement>
                </Link>
                <Link
                  to="/trending"
                  className="linkItem"
                  onClick={this.onSelect}
                >
                  <SelectElement lightTheme={lightTheme}>
                    <HiFire />
                    <SelectItem lightTheme={lightTheme}>Trending</SelectItem>
                  </SelectElement>
                </Link>
                <Link to="/gaming" className="linkItem" onClick={this.onSelect}>
                  <SelectElement lightTheme={lightTheme}>
                    <SiYoutubegaming />
                    <SelectItem lightTheme={lightTheme}>Gaming</SelectItem>
                  </SelectElement>
                </Link>
                <Link
                  to="/saved-videos"
                  className="linkItem"
                  onClick={this.onSelect}
                >
                  <SelectElement lightTheme={lightTheme}>
                    <BiListPlus />
                    <SelectItem lightTheme={lightTheme}>
                      Saved Videos
                    </SelectItem>
                  </SelectElement>
                </Link>
              </LabelElement>
            </DivContainer>
          )
        }}
      </ThemeContext.Consumer>
    )
  }
}

export default Navbar
